It seems like everyone who does computational biology has a different workflow. Whether it be a different IDE, or a host of different libraries, everyone seems to have a set up that is uniqly their own. In an attempt to distill my minimal knowledge about the field to people who might be interested, I thought I’d write a quick post detailing some components of my workflow that I couldn’t live without.

IDEs/Text Editors

#### VIM

**RStudio

Command Line ‘Accessories’

*fd (like find, but I can remember the command) *GNU parallel *ZSH *TMUX

Libraries

*pybedtools *pysamtools *Tidyverse

Bonus

*Rhodia Sketch pad *R for data analysis *good headphones
